title: Restore Reporther branding, metadata, and icon identity

requirements.summary: Replace all user-facing product name/branding copy with "Reporther" in the unauthenticated landing/login experience and the top app header.
acceptanceCriteria: The login/unauthenticated landing page headline displays "Reporther" (not "My Safety Tracker").
The app header brand/title displays "Reporther" (not "Your Safety, Your Power" or other personalized branding).
No remaining occurrences of "My Safety Tracker" or "Safety Tracker" are shown in the core UI (header and login prompt) after this change.

file_operations.description: Update header brand/title text to "Reporther" and remove/replace any remaining "My Safety Tracker" / "Safety Tracker" / personalized header branding copy to match the restored app identity.

Update unauthenticated landing/login hero headline and related branding copy to use "Reporther" and remove/replace any remaining "My Safety Tracker" / "Safety Tracker" copy in the login prompt experience.

requirements.summary: Update PWA/SEO/app metadata so the installed/shared app identifies as "Reporther" across title tags, Apple PWA title, OpenGraph/Twitter titles, and the manifest.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/manifest.json name and short_name are set to "Reporther".
After installing as a PWA, the installed app name shows as "Reporther".

file_operations.description: Change document <title> to "Reporther"; set apple-mobile-web-app-title to "Reporther"; update og:title and twitter:title to "Reporther"; ensure any remaining old/personalized title strings are removed.
Update manifest name/short_name (and description if needed) to consistently identify the app as "Reporther" so installed PWA name no longer shows the old/personalized identity.

requirements.summary: Replace favicon and PWA icon assets with the "man behind bars" Reporther icon set and update all UI/metadata references to use the new filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: A new icon image set exists in frontend/public/assets/generated and is referenced by frontend/index.html and frontend/public/manifest.json.
Header logo image uses the new Reporther icon asset (not /assets/generated/private-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png).
LoginPrompt hero/logo image uses the new Reporther icon asset (not /assets/generated/private-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png).
Manifest icons and shortcut icon reference the new Reporther icon assets (not private-app-*).
Favicon (<link rel='icon'>) and og:image/twitter:image point at the new Reporther icon/fav asset.

file_operations.description: Add the required generated Reporther app icon (man behind bars), 192x192, at frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png.
Add the required generated Reporther app icon (man behind bars), 512x512, at frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-app-icon-512.dim_512x512.png.
Add the required generated Reporther favicon (man behind bars), 200x200, at frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-favicon.dim_200x200.png.

Update favicon, apple-touch-icon, og:image, and twitter:image references to use the new Reporther assets: frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-favicon.dim_200x200.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png; remove references to private-app-* icon assets.

Update manifest icons (including shortcut icon entries) to reference the new Reporther assets frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-app-icon-512.dim_512x512.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-favicon.dim_200x200.png; remove references to private-app-* icon assets.
Update the header logo to use the new Reporther icon asset (frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png) and update alt text to match Reporther branding.
Update the login prompt hero/logo to use the new Reporther icon asset (frontend/public/assets/generated/reporther-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png) and update alt text to match Reporther branding.

requirements.summary: Prevent conflicts with old identity by updating service worker cache naming and precache icon URLs to the new Reporther filenames and removing old private-app icon entries.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/service-worker.js CACHE_NAME and RUNTIME_CACHE are updated to a Reporther-specific value (not 'my-safety-tracker-*').
The PRECACHE_URLS icon entries reference the new Reporther icon filenames and do not include private-app icon filenames.
After a refresh with the updated service worker, the app loads without 404s for icon assets and uses the new icon in cached/offline scenarios.

file_operations.description: Update CACHE_NAME and RUNTIME_CACHE strings to Reporther-specific values; update PRECACHE_URLS to remove private-app icon entries and include the new Reporther icon assets (reporther-app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png, reporther-app-icon-512.dim_512x512.png, reporther-favicon.dim_200x200.png), ensuring offline caching does not request removed icon filenames.
